Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the idea that the political class would not accept Trump because he is a "common person." This exaggeration is based on a fabricated quote falsely attributed to Pelosi.
Understate: There is no understatement bias present in this claim as it does not downplay or minimize any information.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times as it is based on a false attribution and lacks any factual basis.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation bias present in this claim as it is based on a fabricated quote and lacks any alternative interpretations.
